title: The Blood moon skins hype compared to heartseeker skin hype

replies.body: I much prefer the Heartseeker skins and have zero interest in the Blood Moon skins.
4 skins for blood moon along with the comunity requested blood moon diana, heartseeker skin line feels like they are just taking names out of the hat
I REALLY don't get why you would pick Lucian for Heartseeker. At all. There's like 0 reason imho.
Blood Moon is one of the most popular skin lines so of course they would be more hype for them compare to the marksmen only heartseeker skins.
There are skin lines that are more hyped than others. The valentine skins were never as popular as PROJECT or blood moon.
